name: Fairmont Sonoma Mission Inn & Spa

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The SMI is only about a 1/2 hour from our home but it sure is a lovely respite location to stay while traveling around Sonoma.
reviews.title: Lovely spot from which to explore Sonoma

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The Service was excellent! Truly professional and what you would expect from a Fairmont. The property is quite beautiful and well maintained. And yes.....a great spa. It's good enough to be it's own destination.
reviews.title: Relax!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Some of the rooms that are attached to the main building are quite small. Ours was a bit larger, apparently newly renovated and immaculate but it had "old bones". The water took absolutely forever to turn hot in the shower (extreme waste of water) and the heat was so loud as it kicked on and off that we had to shut it off at night on a cold December night. Different room categories might mean newer buildings so I would do a little research.
reviews.title: Loved the Fairmont Sonoma + Great Spa

reviews.text: We traveled with a group of friends to celebrate the holidays and found the bar and fire-pit to be shut down on the early side for a weekend but we made the best of it.
reviews.title: Perfection

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: All in all....a lovely visit that I would be thrilled to duplicate in the future.
reviews.title: We loved it!

aka: Fairmont Sonoma Mission Inn And Spa
